General.Name: iSoftStone Information Technology (Group) Co. Ltd.
General.Description: iSoftStone Information Technology (Group) Co., Ltd. provides software and digital technology service in China and internationally. The company offers digital technology services, including cloud management, cloud computing, big data, Internet of Things, artificial intelligence, blockchain, 5G technology, semiconductor and integrated circuits, and information security services; and general technical services, such as full-stack service, information system and application development, product development and infrastructure engineering, IT operation and maintenance, and software and electronic products testing, as well as provides digital content, customer service, business processes, and other digital operation services. It also provides consulting and software solutions, including enterprise digital transformation planning consultation, digital top-level and enterprise architecture planning and designing, enterprise digital transformation training, financial technology planning and designing, group treasury and fund management consulting, and other services; digital supply chain, data governance and middle-stage, low-carbon space, and enterprise cloud planning and designing; business and IT status research and analysis, new retail planning consulting, data visualization consulting; business process planning and designing, financial planning consulting, commodity trading business process planning, catering industry middle-stage product planning and designing, and master data planning; and banking cash management solution consultation, bank data asset management solution consultation, insurance core business system solution consultation, and other services. The company serves communication equipment, Internet, hi-tech and manufacturing, finance, transportation and logistics, retail and business, energy power, real estate, and general industries. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
